Description: Limestone stela with low relief decoration(worn); illegible text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.150)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I App:31 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
